t: And the LORD{H3068} spake{H1696}{(H8762)} unto Moses{H4872}, saying{H559}{(H8800)},
Speak{H1696}{(H8761)} unto the children{H1121} of Israel{H3478}, and say{H559}{(H8804)} unto them, I am the LORD{H3068} your God{H430}.

After the doings{H4639} of the land{H776} of Egypt{H4714}, wherein ye dwelt{H3427}{(H8804)}, shall ye not do{H6213}{(H8799)}: and after the doings{H4639} of the land{H776} of Canaan{H3667}, whither I bring{H935}{(H8688)} you, shall ye not do{H6213}{(H8799)}: neither shall ye walk{H3212}{(H8799)} in their ordinances{H2708}.
Ye shall do{H6213}{(H8799)} my judgments{H4941}, and keep{H8104}{(H8799)} mine ordinances{H2708}, to walk{H3212}{(H8800)} therein: I am the LORD{H3068} your God{H430}.
Ye shall therefore keep{H8104}{(H8804)} my statutes{H2708}, and my judgments{H4941}: which{H834} if a man{H120} do{H6213}{(H8799)}, he shall live{H2425}{(H8804)} in them: I am the LORD{H3068}.
None of you shall approach{H7126}{(H8799)} to any{H376} that is near{H7607} of kin{H1320} to him, to uncover{H1540}{(H8763)} their nakedness{H6172}: I am the LORD{H3068}.

The nakedness{H6172} of thy father{H1}, or the nakedness{H6172} of thy mother{H517}, shalt thou not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)}: she is thy mother{H517}; thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} her nakedness{H6172}.
The nakedness{H6172} of thy father's{H1} wife{H802} shalt thou not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)}: it is thy father's{H1} nakedness{H6172}.

The nakedness{H6172} of thy sister{H269}, the daughter{H1323} of thy father{H1}, or daughter{H1323} of thy mother{H517}, whether she be born{H4138} at home{H1004}, or born{H4138} abroad{H2351}, even their nakedness{H6172} thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)}.

The nakedness{H6172} of thy son's{H1121} daughter{H1323}, or of thy daughter's{H1323} daughter{H1323}, even their nakedness{H6172} thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)}: for theirs{H2007} is thine own nakedness{H6172}.
The nakedness{H6172} of thy father's{H1} wife's{H802} daughter{H1323}, begotten{H4138} of thy father{H1}, she is thy sister{H269}, thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} her nakedness{H6172}.
Thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} the nakedness{H6172} of thy father's{H1} sister{H269}: she is thy father's{H1} near kinswoman{H7607}.
Thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} the nakedness{H6172} of thy mother's{H517} sister{H269}: for she is thy mother's{H517} near kinswoman{H7607}.
Thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} the nakedness{H6172} of thy father's{H1} brother{H251}, thou shalt not approach{H7126}{(H8799)} to his wife{H802}: she is thine aunt{H1733}.
Thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} the nakedness{H6172} of thy daughter in law{H3618}: she is thy son's{H1121} wife{H802}; thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} her nakedness{H6172}.
Thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} the nakedness{H6172} of thy brother's{H251} wife{H802}: it is thy brother's{H251} nakedness{H6172}.

Thou shalt not uncover{H1540}{(H8762)} the nakedness{H6172} of a woman{H802} and her daughter{H1323}, neither shalt thou take{H3947}{(H8799)} her son's{H1121} daughter{H1323}, or her daughter's{H1323} daughter{H1323}, to uncover{H1540}{(H8763)} her nakedness{H6172}; for they are her near kinswomen{H7608}: it is wickedness{H2154}.
Neither shalt thou take{H3947}{(H8799)} a wife{H802} to her sister{H269}, to vex{H6887}{(H8800)} her, to uncover{H1540}{(H8763)} her nakedness{H6172}, beside the other in her life{H2416} time.
Also thou shalt not approach{H7126}{(H8799)} unto a woman{H802} to uncover{H1540}{(H8763)} her nakedness{H6172}, as long as she is put apart{H5079} for her uncleanness{H2932}.
Moreover thou shalt not{H5414}{(H8799)} lie{H7903} carnally{H2233} with thy neighbour's{H5997} wife{H802}, to defile{H2930}{(H8800)} thyself with her.

And thou shalt not{H5414}{(H8799)} let any of thy seed{H2233} pass{H5674}{(H8687)} through the fire to Molech{H4432}, neither shalt thou profane{H2490}{(H8762)} the name{H8034} of thy God{H430}: I am the LORD{H3068}.
Thou shalt not lie{H7901}{(H8799)} with mankind{H2145}, as with{H4904} womankind{H802}: it is abomination{H8441}.

Neither shalt thou{H5414}{(H8799)} lie{H7903} with any beast{H929} to defile{H2930}{(H8800)} thyself therewith: neither shall any woman{H802} stand{H5975}{(H8799)} before{H6440} a beast{H929} to lie down{H7250}{(H8800)} thereto: it is confusion{H8397}.
Defile{H2930}{(H8691)} not ye yourselves in any of these things{H428}: for in all these the nations{H1471} are defiled{H2930}{(H8738)} which I cast out{H7971}{(H8764)} before{H6440} you:

And the land{H776} is defiled{H2930}{(H8799)}: therefore I do visit{H6485}{(H8799)} the iniquity{H5771} thereof upon it, and the land{H776} itself vomiteth out{H6958}{(H8686)} her inhabitants{H3427}{(H8802)}.

Ye shall therefore keep{H8104}{(H8804)} my statutes{H2708} and my judgments{H4941}, and shall not commit{H6213}{(H8799)} any of these abominations{H8441}; neither any of your own nation{H249}, nor any stranger{H1616} that sojourneth{H1481}{(H8802)} among{H8432} you:
(For all these{H411} abominations{H8441} have the men{H582} of the land{H776} done{H6213}{(H8804)}, which were before{H6440} you, and the land{H776} is defiled{H2930}{(H8799)};)
That the land{H776} spue not you out{H6958}{(H8686)} also, when ye defile{H2930}{(H8763)} it, as it spued out{H6958}{(H8804)} the nations{H1471} that were before{H6440} you.

For whosoever shall commit{H6213}{(H8799)} any of these abominations{H8441}, even the souls{H5315} that commit{H6213}{(H8802)} them shall be cut off{H3772}{(H8738)} from among{H7130} their people{H5971}.

Therefore shall ye keep{H8104}{(H8804)} mine ordinance{H4931}, that ye commit{H6213}{(H8800)} not any one of these abominable{H8441} customs{H2708}, which were committed{H6213}{(H8738)} before{H6440} you, and that ye defile{H2930}{(H8691)} not yourselves therein: I am the LORD{H3068} your God{H430}.
